name: Covenant of Rock
title: Covenant of Rock
desc: "Rex Lapis bestowed him with a pair of eyes to see the world, and came to an agreement with him. The dragon then accompanied the Lord of Geo, fighting campaigns alongside him in the four corners of the world..."

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Can only be played when you have 0 Elemental Dice left: Generate 2 different basic Elemental Dice.(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)
